wikipedia_page.main: Valentina Polukhina (Russian: Валентина Платоновна Полухина;  born 18 June 1936) is a British-Russian scholar, Emeritus Professor at Keele University, and the widow of Daniel Weissbort. She is the recipient of the A. C. Benson Medal and the Medal of Pushkin.

response: *Obituary in The Independent by Valentina Polukhina
